title: KODAK 7XPRO Series 106 cm (42 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV  (42FHDX7XPRO)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, Wall Mount, Manual, 2 AAA Batteries
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Content Providers: Google Play Movies & TV, YouTube, Prime Video
product_specification.Content Languages: Hindi, English, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Tamil, Punjabi, Bhojpuri, Marathi, Bengali, Gujarati, Oriya, Sinhala, Urdu, Rajasthani
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More than 5000 Plus Apps and Games, Airplay, Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows and Games, Google Assistant
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, HotKeys (Prime Video, YouTube, Sony Liv)
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Google Assistant, Lag Free Performance, Large Memory, Voice Controlled Remote
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Vibrant Visuals: This TV’s bright display enhances each scene’s brightness and contrast levels so that you can view the coloured elements on the screen in vivid detail. Explore the beauty of the African savannah or the travel destination on your wish list from the comfort of your home on this TV’s stunning display.
product_description.Android 9.0: Equipped with the user-friendly Android 9.0 operating system, this Android TV lets you easily access your favourite content. You can view new content or re-watch old episodes anytime you want. Plus, Android 9.0 also offers you the added merits of artificial intelligence.

Flipkart delivered the TV in 4th day, The installation was done in 5th day. That's pretty great for a small town like mine.
Now as for as the TV.
1. All the USB Ports, HDMI ports & AV ports are working.
2. Display quality is just fine, similar to my smart LG TV.
3. Sound quality is awesome.
4. Connecting to wifi, chromcast & bluetooth is also good, takes couple of seconds.
5. TV works very smooth, as the processor & RAM is more than sufficient.
6. Outer Hardware quality is very good.


Over and all, a product worth the money, better than MI, & can give a tough competition to LG, MI, Samsung and other brands.

This product is very bad. I have bitter experience with this product. I purchased this product on 6th February 2022 and it was installed on 7th February 2022. Flipkart delivered new one on 18th February and it was installed on 19th February. But again on 27th February, display stopped. Then I informed to Kodak TV and Flipkart also. Flipkart contacted time to time, but there was no response from Kodak TV. Service of Kodak TV is very bad. I had to find out the status/progress to Kodak TV by phone. They have no any responsibility. One-time Kodak TV emailed me that this product is not directly sold by them, so their technician will visit first. But Flipkart sent technician and after check he told me that panel board is bad of this tv, so you replace this with good one. Flipkart is very good, their team return this product and refund me full money. I am very happy to Flipkart. Kodak 7XPRO is not durable or stable product, I think.

The best in this price segment. I will tell you reasons, why you can prefer this, among others.
1. LED TV- So it's as clear from any angle as from front. Even if my mom is cooking something in kitchen, she can clearly see pictures as it is which is at another angle.
2. Sound can be very loud, but quality can be improved.
3. Very light weight. Seriously very light weight!!
4. Simple to use.
5. Least price I guess from others, and if you buy with some card offers then you may even get 1500/- off, which I think decreases it's price.
6. Also there is no LED TV in this price, there are LCD or Other panel, sp check before you buy. So, LED was my first priority for good, clear viewing angles
7. Not very good for connecting laptop or using as a monitor- Bigger in size and refresh rate what I noticed shud be more if you connect computer/ Laptop.
8. It has all connection for av, audio in/out, BT soundbox or any Bluetooth speaker. Sometimes I watch movies connecting my Bluetooth headphones/earphone, which I s great, Only I am the one then hearing.
9. Remote is very handy, less buttons, and more good.
10. Remote' s google assistance works like a charm, just press the button and say hindi songs or anything in hindi or English or any language.
11. Plenty other good features, BTW I have a YT channel ankitanandvlogs, so I keep connecting my laptop to Tv too during edit in Premiere Pro, after effects. But not very okay, for using as monitor as I see pixel density is less, also bcoz screen is bigger. Better buy monitor of less size instead, and remember it's a TV. And you need to adjust color for better viewing.
12. Service seems good, as they came for installation for free and looks like they will assist in future too if required.

It's completely value for money product. At this cost, 43 inch screen, laltest android, WIFI, Bluetooth, google assistant on remote......
Pros:
1. Compare to cost picture quality is superb. Color contrast is eye soothing. Side boundary is very thin, so you get full screen.
2. Compare to cost sound quality is superb. With maximum volume also sound doesn't crack. It's loud enough for big room. Yes ofcourse you can connect home theatre system if you want cinema hall effect.
3. Bluetooth remote, so you no need to point towards the TV. Easy navigation and google assistant is there for you command, ofcourse you will need internet.
4. For internet you have both provisions RJ45 Jack and WIFi. Choice is yours.
5. On time is faster than my expectation.

Cons:
1. Delicate handling required, TV body is not strong enough, only trained technicians can handle.
2. Back side connectivity is bit difficult to access, even for pen drive you need to lift the TV. Either you connect extension cable for that or lift the TV everytime.
3. Sound on bluetooth headphone sometimes crack or delayed. This TV has some issues with bluetooth speaker, may be it's particular unit issue or a general issue of this model, I am not sure.
4. Application installation space is less, so if you want lots of app to install like mobile, there is no space for that. Few apps it's okay.
Speaker and sound quality are awesome, display needs some improvement, installation so quick. Overall value for money!
